attributes.action: STOP the ROAD being built through STANTON BY DALE DERBY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Erewash council have teamed up with a company called spring to recreate stanton by dale with 3000 houses, this will also include a new road being put straight through the green belt of stanton and surrounding villages. The idea of this is appauling and we all must reject this idea to save some of britians heritage.
